abstract: Some questions that members of the Senate Banking Committee should ask Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, when he testifies next week.
snippet: Some questions that members of the Senate Banking Committee should ask Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, when he testifies next week.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Dimon’s trip to Capitol Hill next week to explain his bank’s multibillion-dollar trading debacle could quickly devolve into Washington Gotcha Theater.

headline.main: Some Questions to Ask Mr. Dimon

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

abstract: The advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services recommended on Tuesday that Technicolor investors vote in favor of Vector’s plan to recapitalize the French film equipment maker, rather than a competing proposal by JPMorgan Chase.
snippet: The advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services recommended on Tuesday that Technicolor investors vote in favor of Vector’s plan to recapitalize the French film equipment maker, rather than a competing proposal by JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: In the battle to take a big stake in Technicolor, Vector Capital received a prominent supporter in Institutional Shareholder Services.

headline.main: I.S.S. Sides With Vector in Fight Over Technicolor

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
